articles.title: Apple Music to sponsor Super Bowl halftime show amidst push into sports
articles.description: Apple Music will sponsor next February’s Super Bowl halftime show. Super Bowl LVII is scheduled to take place on February 12th, 2023 in Glendale, Arizona.

articles.title: Joburg woman ranked world no.1 in aerial sports after spinal injury
articles.description: Six years after falling and breaking her back during training, Kaitlin Rawson has not only made a remarkable recovery but is now ranked world number one in pole and aerial sports.
articles.content:
• Kaitlin Rawson fell off poles during practice and injured her neck and spine.
  • She had to relearn to walk.
